text: Saado Ali Warsame (, ; 1950 â€“ 23 July 2014) was a Somali singer-songwriter and politician. She served as a member of the Federal Parliament of Somalia from August 2012 until her assassination. == Death == On 23 July 2014, Warsame and her driver were shot to death by unknown assailants in Mogadishu as she was driving to the hotel. Al-Shabaab claimed responsibility for the attack. ==References== Category:2014 deaths Category:Somali politicians Category:Assassinated people Category:Murders by firearm Category:Singer- songwriters Category:Year of birth missing Category:1950 births Category:Somali murder victims
title: Saado Ali Warsame
